resources.string: Welcome to inSync! \n \ninSync is a project developed by Brian Lam, Steven Huang, Raymond Zeng, and Jason Peng. It allows a Bluetooth-enabled device to send an mp3 file to multiple devices to play it simutaneously across all the devices.
Choose an mp3 to live stream

You can create a music sync session with the Create Session button. Using bluetooth, your phone or tablet will become discoverable to other Android devices and can share an mp3 file. The other phone or tablet will download your mp3 file and when both devices are ready, the music file will start playing at the same time.
